francais: Les trois Augustes et les cinq Empereurs
English: possibly tribal leaders before the historiographers got working on them
usually taken to be Yellow Emperor `黃帝~|黄`帝~[Huang2 di4] and four of his sons Zhuan Xu `顓頊~|颛顼[Zhuan1 Xu1], Di Ku `帝嚳~|`帝~喾[Di4 Ku4], Tang Yao `唐堯~|`唐~尧[Tang2 Yao2], Yu Shun `虞舜~[Yu2 Shun4]
